full_summary:
# Tender Details

## Solicitation Title

SSC Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for Video Conferencing Procurement Vehicle (VCPV) - Refresh 2023

## Tender Reference Number
SSC-23-00024142:T

## Contracting Entity
Shared Services Canada

## Contact Person
Felix Beauchamp
Contact Information:

* Phone: 999-999-9999
* Fax: 999-999-9999
* Address: 400 Cooper Street 6th Floor, Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8

## Tender Description

The Refresh 2023 supply arrangement is a solicitation divided into five parts, along with annexes, forms, and an attachment. The parts include:

* Part 1: General Information - Provides a general description of the requirement
* Part 2: Respondent Instructions - Provides instructions for the clauses and conditions of the supply arrangement
* Part 3: Arrangement Preparation Instructions - Provides OEMs with instructions on how to prepare their arrangements
* Part 4: Evaluation Procedures and Basis of Selection - Describes the evaluation process, evaluation criteria, and basis of selection
* Part 5: Supply Arrangement (5A), Response Solicitation (5B), and Contract Clauses (5C) - Includes the supply arrangement, response solicitation instructions, and resulting contract clauses

## Tender Details

* Amendment Number: 10
* Amendment Date: 2024-02-06
* Tender Status: Expired
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and other agreements.

## Notes

* The supply arrangement is divided into five parts and includes annexes, forms, and an attachment.
* The evaluation process, evaluation criteria, and basis of selection are outlined in Part 4.
* The resulting contract clauses are outlined in Part 5.

This tender is no longer active, but it remains an informative resource for those interested in Video Conferencing Procurement Vehicle (VCPV) supply arrangements.

Note: URLs and file downloads have been excluded for brevity.

Also, you need to answer these questions. I'll provide the questions tomorrow because I need to write the correct format for the response.
